alert.note: Alert for Dorchester; Somerset; Wicomico; Worcester (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 7:01PM EDT until July 29 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM EDT FOR NORTHERN SOMERSET...WICOMICO...WORCESTER AND CENTRAL DORCHESTER COUNTIES... At 701 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles east of Cape Henlopen State Park to near Millville to near University Of Maryland Eastern Shore, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. These severe storms will be near... Ocean Pines around 705 PM EDT. Berlin, Newark, and Cape Isle Of Wight around 710 PM EDT. Snow Hill around 720 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Bishop, Wetipquin, Ocean City Municipality, Trinity, Cokesbury, Eden, Longridge, Cedartown, Mount Vernon, and Chesapeake Heights. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
